item.title: Copy and paste between Vim and OS
item.description: When I first encountered this problem it slightly puzzled me. “Why can not I press ctrl-c to copy the text and ctrl-v to paste?”- I asked myself. Indeed, the majority of source code editors able to do this. And yes, I got used to this dammit!
